name: Dungeon Builder (javachup)
description:
If you played, please fill out this testing form :)

Controls

  • WASD - Move camera 
  • Scroll - Zoom 
  • Q/E - Rotate selected room 
  • Esc - Cancel room placement 
  • Clicking - Menuing 

(Currently the room sprites do not rotate properly. If the room places, it will work properly despite the sprite looking like it will not.)
